text: Yakhana apani tadera madhye thakena, atahpara namaye damrana, takhana yena ekadala damraya apanara sathe ebam tara yena sbiya astra sathe neya. Atahpara yakhana tara sejada sampanna kare, takhana apanara kacha theke yena sare yaya ebam an'ya dala yena ase, yara namaya pareni. Atahpara tara yena apanara sathe namaya pare ebam atmaraksara hatiyara sathe neya. Kapherara caya ye, tomara kona rupe asatarka thaka, yate tara ekayoge tomaderake akramana kare base. Yadi brstira karane tomadera kasta haya athaba tomara asustha ha'o tabe sbiya astra parityaga karaya tomadera kona gonaha ne'i ebam sathe niye na'o tomadera atnaraksara astra. Niscaya allaha kapheradera jan'ye apamanakara sasti prastuta kare rekhechena.
